ygData.subject: Awakenings
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine opens his eyes from a good nights rest, he was exhausted from his bout with Foxfingers the night before. there was a message recorded into his comm

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine opens his eyes from a good nights rest, he was exhausted from his
bout with Foxfingers the night before. there was a message recorded into his
comm set for when he awoke. "Ice is OK, no further signs of the virus exist,
and there are no further side effects." Veratis' message carried good news
indeed, it was time for a visit. He decided to stretch his wolf legs and
transformed. He sprinted down the hall toward the lab eager to see Ice. It
would be hard for him to adjust to the new name but it would be worth the
adjustment.

Foxfingers awoke also with a message. "The labs been cleared, you can come
meet the newest member of our group." He waited for the comm to click off
when Veratis returned, "Oh, and theres still no word from Lady Hawk, I'm
beginning to worry." He became afraid for his long time companion, if she
was lost then the dream may yet fall. "No" he thought, "We put to much faith
in Veratis for our dream to fail." He started to the lab to meet the new
bot. (Ice)
